rows.label: qst202210_msg001
rows.name: Ahh! It's the Shocky Blade!

rows.label: qst202210_msg002
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: qst202210_msg003
rows.name: Did you come to shock Izzi again?!

rows.label: qst202210_msg004
rows.name: Izzi is the boy who got shocked, mo?

rows.label: qst202210_msg005
rows.name: That's right. Shocky Izzi!

rows.label: qst202210_msg006
rows.name:
Um, I came to apologize to
him. Do you know where he is?

rows.label: qst202210_msg007
rows.name:
Whaaat? You say that, but you'll
just shock him again, right?

rows.label: qst202210_msg008
rows.name:
It's okay, mo! She can control
her lightning power now. No
more shocky-shocky, mo.

rows.label: qst202210_msg009
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Really?

rows.label: qst202210_msg010
rows.name:
It's true, mo. Raiko has
helped lots of people with
her lightning power, mo.

rows.label: qst202210_msg019
rows.name:
Recently, she even powered up
the sparkly device in Avaritia
with her lightning, mo!

rows.label: qst202210_msg020
rows.name:
Oh, I heard about that! I
wish I could've seen it...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202210_msg011
rows.name: Mmm... Okay, I believe you.

rows.label: qst202210_msg012
rows.name: Ah...[ML:Dash ] But Izzi's not here right now.

rows.label: qst202210_msg013
rows.name: Do you know where he is?

rows.label: qst202210_msg014
rows.name:
Hmmm, he said something about
catching a rare bug...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202210_msg015
rows.name:
He went off toward
Koorell Water Drains.

rows.label: qst202210_msg016
rows.name: Thank you! I'll go look for him!

rows.label: qst202210_msg017
rows.name:
Shocky big sis! Make sure
you make up with Izzi!

rows.label: qst202210_msg018
rows.name: I will! I promise we'll make up!
